verses.text: Thou \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w be|strong="G3767"\w* \w strong|strong="G1743"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w same|strong="G3739"\w* \w commend|strong="G3908"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w fit|strong="G2425"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.
Labour \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w No|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, being a \w soldier|strong="G4754"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* God, entangleth himself \w with|strong="G0979"\w* secular businesses; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w him|strong="G2443"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* he hath engaged himself.

\w For|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1437"\w* striveth \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* mastery, \w is|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w crowned|strong="G4737"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* strive \w lawfully|strong="G3545"\w*.
\w The|strong="G3588"\w* husbandman, that laboureth, \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* partake \w of|strong="G4413"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fruits|strong="G2590"\w*.

\w Understand|strong="G3539"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* thee \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w understanding|strong="G4907"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G5547"\w* mindful \w that|strong="G3421"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Lord \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w again|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G2596"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

Wherein \w I|strong="G3739"\w* labour \w even|strong="G3360"\w* unto bands, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w an|strong="G5613"\w* evildoer; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w endure|strong="G5278"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w obtain|strong="G5177"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* heavenly \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1487"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* dead \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G4800"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* suffer, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w reign|strong="G4821"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* us.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G1487"\w* \w believe|strong="G0569"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w he|strong="G1565"\w* continueth \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*, \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G2316"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* put \w them|strong="G0191"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* mind, charging \w them|strong="G0191"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. Contend \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w words|strong="G3054"\w*, \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0191"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* profit, \w but|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* subverting \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hearers|strong="G0191"\w*.

Carefully study \w to|strong="G2316"\w* \w present|strong="G3936"\w* thyself \w approved|strong="G1384"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w a|strong="G2316"\w* \w workman|strong="G2040"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* needeth not \w to|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G0422"\w*, rightly \w handling|strong="G3718"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* shun \w profane|strong="G0952"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* vain babblings: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* grow \w much|strong="G4183"\w* towards \w ungodliness|strong="G0763"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* spreadeth \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* canker: \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* Hymeneus \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philetus|strong="G5372"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* erred \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w is|strong="G5100"\w* past \w already|strong="G2235"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* subverted \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sure|strong="G1097"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* standeth \w firm|strong="G2476"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w seal|strong="G4973"\w*: \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* knoweth \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G3778"\w* \w depart|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* nameth \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w gold|strong="G5552"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w silver|strong="G0693"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w wood|strong="G3585"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* earth: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* unto honour, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* unto dishonour.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* cleanse \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* unto honour, \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w and|strong="G5092"\w* profitable \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G1203"\w*, \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* unto \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* thou \w youthful|strong="G3512"\w* \w desires|strong="G1939"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w pursue|strong="G1377"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, charity, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G1377"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w a|strong="G3326"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* avoid \w foolish|strong="G3474"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unlearned \w questions|strong="G2214"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* beget strifes.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* wrangle: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* mild towards \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w*, apt \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w teach|strong="G1317"\w*, \w patient|strong="G0420"\w*,

\w With|strong="G1722"\w* modesty admonishing \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* resist \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*: \w if|strong="G3379"\w* peradventure \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w may|strong="G2316"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* know \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* recover \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* snares \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w held|strong="G2221"\w* \w captive|strong="G2221"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*.
